title: Aanmodderfakker - How To Avoid Everything (2014 - NL) eng subs
description:
Aanmodderfakker (2014 - Netherlands)                How To Avoid Everything

Comedy / Romance
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3983266/


3 Award WINS and 5 Award NOMINATIONS

A coming-of-age film, but 15 years too late. Aanmodderfakker is about 32-year-old Thijs who has been studying for ages, but in practice doesn't do anything with his life. He works at an electronics store, is always spilling his drinks on his keyboard and doesn't even own his own washing machines. These events are his only structure in his life. He has no goals, no girlfriend and despite the fact that his parents support him financially he still has a tax debt. When he visits his sister he meets the ambitious Lisa, the sixteen year old sister of his brother-in-law. He falls for her, despite the huge age difference. Will he continue his path of wrong decisions or take responsibility?


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 712x424, 25.000 fps, 951 Kbps, 01h38m39s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, 6 channel, 448 kbps

DVDRip, Dutch audio, optional subtitles Dutch, Dutch hearing impaired, English
